viewData.name: LG LJ4540 24" Class HD LED TV (Black)
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LJ4540 24" Class HD LED TV (Black) featuring HD 1366 x 768 LED Panel, HDMI Input Triple XD Engine. Review LG LJ4540
viewData.long_description: Enjoy high-definition content with the blackÂ LG LJ4540 24" Class HD LED TV. This 23.6" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 1366 x 768, allowing you to view detailed 720p HD images. Its HDMI input will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles. A remote control is included as an added convenience.
